attributes.action: Petition for recall not modify Hotpoint/indesit/whirlpool faulty tumble dryers
attributes.background: Modifications in these dryers  are not being met within safe time scales and in some cases are causing damage to tbe dryer. I'm asking for every affected dryer to be recalled and replaced with a safe one within reasonable time or a complete refund so people can purchase a new one of choice

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You can find more information about making a report to Trading Standards here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/get-more-help/report-to-trading-standards/
